description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[A Journal of the transactions and occurrences in the Settlement of Massachusetts, and the other New England Colonies, from the year 1630 to 1644: written by J. W., first Governor of Massachusetts: and now first published from a correct copy of the original manuscript.]" Author: WINTHROP, John - Governor of Massachusetts Contributor: Savage, James Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1061.f.1." Page: 389 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1825 Edition: [Another edition.] The History of New England from 1630 to 1649. By J. W. ... From his original manuscripts. With notes ... by James Savage. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003954691 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
